title: They're probably going to sell uncorrupted SG skins as Chromas
body: I've seen this coming from a while ago. Now you have to also buy a chroma to "complete" the skin. Riot is desperate for money so I wouldn't be suprised if they actually did this.

replies.body:
There is no mention of chromas for any of the SG skins anywhere, I believe, and there aren't any chromas for them on PBE either.
So, at the moment, extremely unlikely.

it- IT FEELS SO WRONG!!!!! WHY RIOT!!!!

Well a Star Guardian's color is determined by their gem, yeah?
So I suppose chromas can be explained like that, that they're a different color because they're using a different gem.
Zoe has more chromas because she's murdered countless Star Guardians and stole their gems, while Xayah and Rakan likely tried out different gems in an effort to save themselves.

Still, you're right. Feels off for Star Guardians to have chromas.

Dude... that is like... mind fuckin' BLOWN!! It feels so off for star guardians to get chromas but as you said, their skins are multiple colors and zoe has stolen many other stars making her have a bunch of different colors- just.... WHOA!!! 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
If they made the PURE SG chromas (more like variants, which is what I'm hoping for), then I would love those. Regular chromas for actual SG skins? No thanks.

I read on reddi that a developer said there would be chromas, but I'm not one hundred percent certain if a riot developer did write that. Historically, star guardians have never had chromas. There colors are unique to each star guardian. Project is different. They previous said they didn't make chromas for project due to the particle effects clashing with the different chroma colors.

I don't think chromas for SG would be a good idea and would clash with what makes SG uniforms unique to each SG member.

This might be hard to believe, but I seriously doubt that. I think the lore factor is far more important to them than a measly cash grab. I know I'm saying that after Eternals, but let's be realistic here.
